protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the irreversible NADPH-dependent deamination of GMP to IMP. It functions in the conversion of nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide derivatives of G to A nucleotides, and in maintaining the intracellular balance of A and G nucleotides.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on nadh or nadph
oxidoreductase activity, acting on nadh or nadph, nitrogenous group as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
